title: KDP BSR  - What is it? Does it Matter? Should I Care? | KDP Low Content Books
description:
In this video, I review the KDP BSR (Best Seller Rank) and answer several questions including:
1. What is it?
2. Does your BSR matter?
3. Should I care what my BSR is?
4. How often should I check it?
5. What BSR should I aim for?

I take you inside a couple of my own books to show you the 'roller-coaster' that you are likely to experience with your BSR on a daily, weekly and annual basis. Hold-On tight, it will be a bumpy ride!
